creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: thick, padded kimono; grey and black geometric design on torso and sleeves; grey and black multi-directional diagonal stripe pattern with grey clockwise swastikas connecting grey lines; indigo lining throughout interior; indigo bands around sleeve ends and bottom; indigo rectangles at bottom of front opening flaps; large off-white circular design of flower and spiraling leaves on upper back; katazome technique
markings: interior bottom of proper left front panel next to opening: J-29-9-D
title: Kimono-shaped quilt (yogi) with crest
